steps.value: Given I am on main application page
When I change window size to `${resolution}`
When I go to relative URL `/my-cases`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-create-new-case-button)` appears
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-create-new-case-button)`
When I wait until element located by `caseSensitiveText(Select Case Type)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case`

scenarios.title: check create new episode of care button

steps.value: When I go to relative URL `/new-case`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-new-case-card-button)->filter.index(1)`
When I wait until element located by `testId(jnj-save-button)` appears
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/episode-of-care`
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-vertical-stepper)`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-new-case-left-bar-default` using screenshot configuration:
|shootingStrategy|cutRight               |
|SIMPLE          |${context-x-coordinate}|

steps: When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-vertical-stepper-button)->filter.index(<iterator>)`
When I save text of context element to scenario variable `button-text`
When I click on element located by `xpath(.)`
Then page is scrolled to element located by `tagName(h2)->filter.caseSensitiveText(${button-text})`

steps.value: When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-vertical-stepper-button)->filter.index(((2)))`
When I save text of context element to ((scenario)) variable `button-text`
When I click on element located by `xpath(.)`
When I reset context
Then page is scrolled to element located by `tagName(h2)->filter.caseSensitiveText(${button-text})`
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-vertical-stepper-button)->filter.index(((1)))`
When I save text of context element to ((scenario)) variable `button-text`
When I click on element located by `xpath(.)`
When I reset context
Then page is scrolled to element located by `tagName(h2)->filter.caseSensitiveText(${button-text})`

scenarios.title: Check new ep of care form (Patient and Surgery sections)

steps.value: When I change context to element located by `xpath(//*[@id='Patient']/..)`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-new-episode-of-care`

scenarios.title: Fill the required fields in Patient section of New ep of care form

steps.value: When I enter `#{generate(regexify '[0-9]{8}')}` in field located by `fieldName(patientId)`
When I enter `#{generate(Name.firstName)}` in field located by `fieldName(firstName)`
When I enter `#{generate(Name.lastName)}` in field located by `fieldName(lastName)`
When I enter `#{randomInt(1, 30)}` in field located by `fieldName(bmi)`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@aria-label='Choose date'])`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@aria-current='date'])`
When I click on element located by `((testId(jnj-patient-form-gender)))`
When I save number of elements located `xpath(//*[@role='option'])` to ((SCENARIO)) variable `options`
When I click on element located by `xpath(//*[@role='option'])->filter.index(#{generate(regexify '[1-${options}]')})`
When I select random option from dropdown located `testId(jnj-patient-form-gender)`
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-vertical-stepper)`

When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-new-case-left-bar-complete` using screenshot configuration:
|shootingStrategy|cutRight               |
|SIMPLE          |${context-x-coordinate}|
When I reset context

scenarios.title: Fill the optional field in Patient section of New ep of care form

steps.value: When I enter `#{generate(Matz.quote)}` in field located `fieldName(additionalContext)`

steps: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I click on element located by `testId(<button-id>)`

steps.value: When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-close-icon-confirm-dialog)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/episode-of-care`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-close-button)`
When I click on element located by `testId(((jnj-button-confirm-confirm-dialog)))`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case/episode-of-care`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-cancel-button)`
When I change context to element located by `testId(jnj-confirm-dialog)`
When I ((${visual-action})) baseline with name `${profile}-${resolution}-cancel-new-case-pop-up`
When I click on element located by `testId(jnj-button-reject-confirm-dialog)`
Then `#{extractPathFromUrl(${current-page-url})}` is ((equal to)) `/new-case`
